response.overview: Can one have a private space in public? This question would put up for discussion the meaning that  private space takes in a public sphere. In Albania, this question would be understood as a request to share one's privacy with other people. The overlapping of the visuals of the filmed people with the audio from the room of the filming person represents the smooth but unnecessary and unwanted entrance of a person into another person's life.
response.title: is anyone watching
